A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite some solid performances and rich visuals\, TLJ is an unpleasant film that disrespects the legacy of Star Wars\, and leaves the Sequel Trilogy in a sort of limbo where nothing interesting is happening.\nOften playing like a parody made by someone who hated the other Star Wars films\, The Last Jedi is one of the most disappointing blockbuster films in years
